The second clause is translated into Limburgish as "is ‘t vooraan hèt nooit duidelik bewees dat geneesmiddelen bestemd zyn om bestaande infectie te behandelen" which means "up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection."
